entry.title: redis cluster 集群 安装 配置 详解
entry.summary:
Redis 集群是一个提供在多个Redis间节点间共享数据的程序集.redis3.0以前，只支持主从同步的，如果主的挂了，写入就成问题了。3.0出来后就可以很好帮我们解决这个问题。

目前redis 3.0还不稳定，如果要用在生产环境中，要慎重。

一，redis服务器说明

1.  <span><span>192.168.10.219 6379  </span></span>
2.  <span>192.168.10.219 6380  </span>
3.  <span>192.168.10.219 6381  </span>
4.  <span>  </span>
5.  <span>192.168.10.220 6382  </span>
6.  <span>192.168.10.220 6383  </span>
7.  <span>192.168.10.220 6384  </span></div>

要让集群正常运作至少需要三个主节点，不过在刚开始试用集群功能时， 强烈建议使用六个节点： 其中三个为主节点， 而其余三个则是各个主节点的从节点。所有用二台机器，开6个redis进程，模拟6台机器。

二，安装ruby,rubygems

1.  <span><span># yum -y install gcc openssl-devel libyaml-devel libffi-devel readline-devel zlib-devel gdbm-devel ncurses-devel gcc-c++ automake autoconf  </span></span>
2.  <span>  </span>
3.  <span># yum -y install ruby rubygems   <span class="comment">//安装ruby rubygems</span><span>  </span></span>
4.  <span>  </span>
5.  <span><span class="comment">//换源</span><span>  </span></span>
6.  <span># gem source -l  </span>
7.  <span># gem source --remove http:<span class="comment">//rubygems.org/</span><span>  </span></span>
8.  <span># gem sources -a http:<span class="comment">//ruby.taobao.org/</span><span>  </span></span>
9.  <span># gem source -l  </span>
10.  <span>  </span>
11.  <span># gem install redis --version 3.0.0  <span class="comment">//安装gem_redis</span><span>  </span></span>
12.  <span>Successfully installed redis-3.0.0  </span>
13.  <span>1 gem installed  </span>
14.  <span>Installing ri documentation <span class="keyword">for</span><span> redis-3.0.0...  </span></span>
15.  <span>Installing RDoc documentation <span class="keyword">for</span><span> redis-3.0.0...  </span></span>

三，安装redis3.0.0

1，安装redis

1.  <span><span># wget http:</span><span class="comment">//download.redis.io/releases/redis-3.0.0.tar.gz</span><span>  </span></span>
2.  <span># tar -xvzf redis-3.0.0.tar.gz  </span>
3.  <span># cd redis-3.0.0  </span>
4.  <span># make && make install  </span>
5.  <span># cd src  </span>
6.  <span># cp redis-trib.rb /usr/local/bin    </span>
7.  <span>  </span>
8.  <span># <span class="func">mkdir</span><span> /etc/redis  </span></span>
9.  <span># <span class="func">mkdir</span><span> /</span><span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis  </span></span>

上述操作要先在二台机器上面都操作好。

2,配置redis

1. <span><span>[root@slave2 redis-3.0.0]#  vim redis.conf   </span><span class="comment">//解压的根目录，有redis.conf,做以下修改</span><span>  </span></span>
2.  <span>port 6379  </span>
3.  <span>pidfile /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/run/redis-6379.pid  </span></span>
4.  <span>dbfilename dump-6379.rdb  </span>
5.  <span>appendfilename <span class="string">"appendonly-6379.aof"</span><span>  </span></span>
6.  <span>cluster-config-file nodes-6379.conf  </span>
7.  <span>cluster-enabled yes  </span>
8.  <span>cluster-node-timeout 5000  </span>
9.  <span>appendonly yes  </span>

3，copy配置文件，并修改端口

1.  <span><span># cp redis.conf /etc/redis/redis-6379.conf  </span></span>
2.  <span># cp redis.conf /etc/redis/redis-6380.conf  </span>
3.  <span># cp redis.conf /etc/redis/redis-6381.conf  </span>
4.  <span>  </span>
5.  <span># scp redis.conf 192.168.10.220:/etc/redis/redis-6382.conf  </span>
6.  <span># scp redis.conf 192.168.10.220:/etc/redis/redis-6383.conf  </span>
7.  <span># scp redis.conf 192.168.10.220:/etc/redis/redis-6384.conf  </span>
8.  <span>  </span>
9.  <span># sed -i <span class="string">"s/6379/6380/g"</span><span> /etc/redis/redis-6380.conf  </span></span>
10.  <span># sed -i <span class="string">"s/6379/6381/g"</span><span> /etc/redis/redis-6381.conf  </span></span>
11.  <span>  </span>
12.  <span># sed -i <span class="string">"s/6379/6382/g"</span><span> /etc/redis/redis-6382.conf  </span></span>
13.  <span># sed -i <span class="string">"s/6379/6383/g"</span><span> /etc/redis/redis-6383.conf  </span></span>
14.  <span># sed -i <span class="string">"s/6379/6384/g"</span><span> /etc/redis/redis-6384.conf  </span></span>

将配置文件分别copy到二台机器上，并替换端口：

1.  <span><span># cat redis-6380.conf |awk </span><span class="string">'{if($0 !~ /^$/ && $0 !~ /#/) {print $0}}'</span><span> |grep 6380  </span></span>
2.  <span>pidfile /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/run/redis-6380.pid  </span></span>
3.  <span>port 6380  </span>
4.  <span>dbfilename dump-6380.rdb  </span>
5.  <span>appendfilename <span class="string">"appendonly-6380.aof"</span><span>  </span></span>
6.  <span>cluster-config-file nodes-6380.conf  </span>

有5处修改端口的地方

4，启动并查看redis

1.  <span><span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6379.conf > /</span><span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6379.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
2.  <span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6380.conf > /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6380.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
3.  <span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6381.conf > /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6381.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
4.  <span>  </span>
5.  <span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6382.conf > /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6382.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
6.  <span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6383.conf > /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6383.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
7.  <span># redis-server /etc/redis/redis-6384.conf > /<span class="keyword">var</span><span>/log/redis/redis-6384.log 2>&1 &  </span></span>
8.  <span>  </span>
9.  <span># netstat -tpnl |grep redis  </span>
10.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:6379                0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7298/redis-server *  </span>
11.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:6380                0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7299/redis-server *  </span>
12.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:6381                0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7304/redis-server *  </span>
13.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:16379               0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7298/redis-server *  </span>
14.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:16380               0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7299/redis-server *  </span>
15.  <span>tcp        0      0 0.0.0.0:16381               0.0.0.0:*                   LISTEN      7304/redis-server *  </span>
16.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::6379                     :::*                        LISTEN      7298/redis-server *  </span>
17.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::6380                     :::*                        LISTEN      7299/redis-server *  </span>
18.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::6381                     :::*                        LISTEN      7304/redis-server *  </span>
19.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::16379                    :::*                        LISTEN      7298/redis-server *  </span>
20.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::16380                    :::*                        LISTEN      7299/redis-server *  </span>
21.  <span>tcp        0      0 :::16381                    :::*                        LISTEN      7304/redis-server *  </span>
22.  <span>  </span>
23.  <span>[root@slave2 redis]# ll /etc/redis/  </span>
24.  <span>总用量 156  </span>
25.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     0 4月  30 23:54 appendonly-6379.aof  </span>
26.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     0 5月   1 00:08 appendonly-6380.aof  </span>
27.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root     0 5月   1 00:08 appendonly-6381.aof  </span>
28.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    18 5月   1 00:08 dump-6379.rdb  </span>
29.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    18 5月   1 00:08 dump-6380.rdb  </span>
30.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root    18 5月   1 00:08 dump-6381.rdb  </span>
31.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   763 5月   1 00:08 nodes-6379.conf  </span>
32.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   763 5月   1 00:08 nodes-6380.conf  </span>
33.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root   763 5月   1 00:08 nodes-6381.conf  </span>
34.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 41412 4月  30 23:30 redis-6379.conf  </span>
35.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 41412 4月  30 23:39 redis-6380.conf  </span>
36.  <span>-rw-r--r-- 1 root root 41412 4月  30 23:39 redis-6381.conf  </span>

所有节点都启动成功，并不代表，他们就是集群了。

四，创建集群，并查看

1，创建redis集群

1.  <span><span># redis-trib.rb create --replicas 1 192.168.10.219:6379 192.168.10.219:6380 192.168.10.219:6381 192.168.10.220:6382 192.168.10.220:6383 192.168.10.220:6384  </span></span></div><pre class="php" name="code" style="display: none;"># redis-trib.rb create --replicas 1 192.168.10.219:6379 192.168.10.219:6380 192.168.10.219:6381 192.168.10.220:6382 192.168.10.220:6383 192.168.10.220:6384</pre>

2，查看redis集群状态

1.  <span><span>[root@slave2 redis]# redis-trib.rb check 192.168.10.219:6379  </span></span>
2.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6379: OK  </span>
3.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.220:6384: OK  </span>
4.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6381: OK  </span>
5.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.220:6383: OK  </span>
6.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.220:6382: OK  </span>
7.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6380: OK  </span>
8.  <span>>>> Performing Cluster Check (using node 192.168.10.219:6379)  </span>
9.  <span>M: d40d9a367c24784b0336c7b80fb4c87337e2cba6 192.168.10.219:6379  </span>
10.  <span> slots:5461-10922 (5462 slots) master  </span>
11.  <span> 1 additional replica(s)  </span>
12.  <span>S: 5f00f163d0c0a540ea99daf004f55588a802327b 192.168.10.220:6384  </span>
13.  <span> slots: (0 slots) slave  </span>
14.  <span> replicates d40d9a367c24784b0336c7b80fb4c87337e2cba6  </span>
15.  <span>S: b3b1a848987b5a87a06888e126d5c9b16f871ff5 192.168.10.219:6381  </span>
16.  <span> slots: (0 slots) slave  </span>
17.  <span> replicates d2eb5a8a77f87888792428aed4692dfb907e7a1d  </span>
18.  <span>M: d2eb5a8a77f87888792428aed4692dfb907e7a1d 192.168.10.220:6383  </span>
19.  <span> slots:10923-16383 (5461 slots) master  </span>
20.  <span> 1 additional replica(s)  </span>
21.  <span>M: a8eafe8b19d6a28c034917da13a43ce1230fe870 192.168.10.220:6382  </span>
22.  <span> slots:0-5460 (5461 slots) master  </span>
23.  <span> 1 additional replica(s)  </span>
24.  <span>S: a87d207204a53ab599bf7f6ffb9d679d0eef4f25 192.168.10.219:6380  </span>
25.  <span> slots: (0 slots) slave  </span>
26.  <span> replicates a8eafe8b19d6a28c034917da13a43ce1230fe870  </span>
27.  <span>[OK] All nodes agree about slots configuration.  </span>
28.  <span>>>> Check <span class="keyword">for</span><span> open slots...  </span></span>
29.  <span>>>> Check slots coverage...  </span>
30.  <span>[OK] All 16384 slots covered.  </span>

到这儿，redis集群就配置成功了

五，测试redis集群

1.  <span><span># redis-cli -c -p 6379 -h 192.168.10.219   </span><span class="comment">//在219登录</span><span>  </span></span>
2.  <span>192.168.10.219:6379> set tank tank1    <span class="comment">//设置测试值</span><span>  </span></span>
3.  <span>-> Redirected to slot [4407] located at 192.168.10.220:6382  </span>
4.  <span>OK   <span class="comment">//直接转向到220 6382端口，数据存到了220 6382，不过有点奇怪</span><span>  </span></span>
5.  <span>192.168.10.220:6382> get tank   <span class="comment">//可以取到值</span><span>  </span></span>
6.  <span><span class="string">"tank1"</span><span>  </span></span>
7.  <span>  </span>
8.  <span>[root@manage redis]# redis-cli -c -p 6383 -h 192.168.10.220  <span class="comment">//220机器，6383端口</span><span>  </span></span>
9.  <span>192.168.10.220:6383> get tank  </span>
10.  <span>-> Redirected to slot [4407] located at 192.168.10.220:6382  <span class="comment">//直接转向220 6382端口</span><span>  </span></span>
11.  <span><span class="string">"tank1"</span><span>  </span></span>
12.  <span>  </span>
13.  <span>[root@manage redis]# ps aux |grep redis <span class="comment">//查看进程</span><span>  </span></span>
14.  <span>root      7310  0.2  0.9 137436  9724 pts/0    Sl   Apr30   0:09 redis-server *:6382 [cluster]  </span>
15.  <span>root      7311  0.2  0.9 137436  9776 pts/0    Sl   Apr30   0:09 redis-server *:6383 [cluster]  </span>
16.  <span>root      7316  0.2  0.9 137436  9944 pts/0    Sl   Apr30   0:10 redis-server *:6384 [cluster]  </span>
17.  <span>root      7478  0.0  0.0 103256   812 pts/0    S+   00:56   0:00 grep redis  </span>
18.  <span>  </span>
19.  <span>[root@manage redis]# kill -9 7310  <span class="comment">//关闭220 6382端口，看数据会不会丢失</span><span>  </span></span>
20.  <span>  </span>
21.  <span>[root@slave2 redis]# redis-trib.rb check 192.168.10.219:6379  <span class="comment">//查看集群情况，任何接口都行</span><span>  </span></span>
22.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6379: OK  </span>
23.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.220:6384: OK  </span>
24.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6381: OK  </span>
25.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.220:6383: OK  </span>
26.  <span>Connecting to node 192.168.10.219:6380: OK  </span>
27.  <span>>>> Performing Cluster Check (using node 192.168.10.219:6379)  </span>
28.  <span>M: d40d9a367c24784b0336c7b80fb4c87337e2cba6 192.168.10.219:6379  </span>
29.  <span> slots:5461-10922 (5462 slots) master  </span>
30.  <span> 1 additional replica(s)  </span>
31.  <span>S: 5f00f163d0c0a540ea99daf004f55588a802327b 192.168.10.220:6384  </span>
32.  <span> slots: (0 slots) slave  </span>
33.  <span> replicates d40d9a367c24784b0336c7b80fb4c87337e2cba6  </span>
34.  <span>S: b3b1a848987b5a87a06888e126d5c9b16f871ff5 192.168.10.219:6381  </span>
35.  <span> slots: (0 slots) slave  </span>
36.  <span> replicates d2eb5a8a77f87888792428aed4692dfb907e7a1d  </span>
37.  <span>M: d2eb5a8a77f87888792428aed4692dfb907e7a1d 192.168.10.220:6383  </span>
38.  <span> slots:10923-16383 (5461 slots) master  </span>
39.  <span> 1 additional replica(s)  </span>
40.  <span>M: a87d207204a53ab599bf7f6ffb9d679d0eef4f25 192.168.10.219:6380  </span>
41.  <span> slots:0-5460 (5461 slots) master  </span>
42.  <span> 0 additional replica(s)  </span>
43.  <span>[OK] All nodes agree about slots configuration.  </span>
44.  <span>>>> Check <span class="keyword">for</span><span> open slots...  </span></span>
45.  <span>>>> Check slots coverage...  </span>
46.  <span>[OK] All 16384 slots covered.  <span class="comment">//变成，三主二从了</span><span>  </span></span>
47.  <span>  </span>
48.  <span>[root@slave2 redis]# redis-cli -c -p 6379 -h 192.168.10.219    <span class="comment">//219登录</span><span>  </span></span>
49.  <span>192.168.10.219:6379> get tank  </span>
50.  <span>-> Redirected to slot [4407] located at 192.168.10.219:6380   <span class="comment">//数据被转到了6380节点了</span><span>  </span></span>
51.  <span><span class="string">"tank1"</span><span>  </span></span>

经测试，集群是可用的。
